name: MangaFox(DarkRelax) 2017 / Fanfox
description:
Dark Mesh Theme Turns Mangafox/Fanfox into a more darker shade with emphases in beauty and care of users eye.
Customize Options: ■ Custom Font Color. ■ Remove Ads content, thus improving loading of pages. ■ Remove other unwanted content, also for faster page loading.
additional_info:
[v1.0.6] 2018/01/29
- Added functionality on Fanfox.net

[v1.0.5] 2018/01/28
- More ads added to blocklist

[v1.0.4] 2018/01/02
- Fixed bookmark page styles.

[v1.0.3] 2017/12/15
- Fixed numerous little things: icons, buttons, font colors, etc.
- Remove some unnoticed ads.

[v1.0.2] 2017/11/26
- Added functionality on Mangafox.la

[v1.0.0] 2017/10/05
- Initial release
